name: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for changing a vehicleâ€™s seat-related settings.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveEnableCooling(for: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the seat cooling system.

items.name: func resolveEnableHeating(for: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the seat heating system.

items.name: func resolveEnableMassage(for: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether you can enable the seat massage system.

items.name: func resolveLevel(for: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INIntegerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the intensity level of the requested system.

items.name: func resolveRelativeLevelSetting(for: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, with: (INRelativeSettingResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested relative qualifier for the intensity level.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntent, completion: (INSetSeatSettingsInCarIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can change the seat settings.
